items.title: Bulbasaur
items.subtitle: Generation 1: Grass, Poison
items.text: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight.

items.title: Charmander
items.subtitle: Generation 1: Fire
items.text: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions.

items.title: Squirtle
items.subtitle: Generation 1: Water
items.text: Squirtle's shell is not merely used for protection

items.title: Pikachu
items.subtitle: Generation 1: Electric
items.text: Whenever Pikachu comes across something new, it blasts it with a jolt of electricity.
